recipesJson.name: Simple Cinnamon Toast Crunch
recipesJson.author: Jmill157
recipesJson.description:
First attempt, shake and vape. See my note below. 

CTC by FLV is almost a good enough single flavor. I used that for most of the cinnamon, it creates the grain, and a small amount of cream — so a random cream base was made and used to help boost the milk. Overall happy with my first recipe, a simple one, after mixing others since 2016! Nothing perfect but it’s mine!

reviews.text: This is a pretty enjoyable vape actually and a great attempt for a first recipe. Obviously, the mixer could have gone down a much deeper route with the milk, but it kinda works with FLV Cream and FA Meringue combo.
